title: High Resolution in game
body: Today i got into a youtuber who has a resolution that looks cool for me and i was wondering how i can get it the youtubers name is redmercy and hes pov is what i ask

replies.body:
TARGONS 
ty but on his twitter ill see some settings or what ? i dont understand
Are you a youtuber that wants to record at 1080p 60fps like Redmercy's videos or am I completely off the mark here? I'm not sure I understand your question.
I want to know how can i get that fov like redmercy

His FoV on his latest video looks normal to me. I'm not sure if he has any other settings, but if you want to double-check, I recommend reaching out to [Redmercy](https://twitter.com/RedmercyLoL?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor) on Twitter.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
